about_the_game:
Get ready to dive into the world of Phantom Spark and enter a state of deep focus, whether you're going head-to-head against Fwinti or hitting the treadmill.

The Phantom Spark soundtrack features a dreamy drum-and-bass inspired soundscape with 20 original tracks and 20 accompanying ambient mixes composed by Joar Renolen.

includes all 40 tracks in flac (uncompressed) + mp3 (192kbps)
detailed_description:
Get ready to dive into the world of Phantom Spark and enter a state of deep focus, whether you're going head-to-head against Fwinti or hitting the treadmill.

The Phantom Spark soundtrack features a dreamy drum-and-bass inspired soundscape with 20 original tracks and 20 accompanying ambient mixes composed by Joar Renolen.

includes all 40 tracks in flac (uncompressed) + mp3 (192kbps)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1 GB available space

short_description: Dive into the captivating high-speed world of Phantom Spark
